com.ibm.db2.tools.repl.publication
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.ibm.db2.tools.repl.publication.Utils
public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

This class contains a bunch of static methods to help format an object as a readable textual string.
